Title: Celestial - CES-02 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With two variants in both warm and cool color palettes, this Nourison - Celestial CES-02 area rug can bring an exquisite sunset or an icy mountain straight into your living room.

  • Modern abstract rug brings fresh appeal to contemporary settings.
  • Use this rug to add a nature-inspired layer of warmth to a cold floor or to perk up a dull room.
  • Because it's machine-made from 100% synthetic fibers, this rug will resist stains common to other fibers.
  • Vacuum your rug regularly but without the beater bar turned on, and always blot spills immediately.
  • Made in Turkey.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Aloha - ALH-05 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Awesome is the first word that comes to mind to describe the Nourison - Aloha ALH-05 Area Rug. Awash in gorgeous color outlining massive blooms, this area rug will make a big style statement wherever it resides.

  • Please Note: The 9'6"x13' rug will be delivered in an economically folded package.
  • Flat woven with a soft cut pile for delightful texture underfoot.
  • Nourison's Aloha collection is at once durable and exceptionally beautiful in color and texture.
  • Perfectly suitable for so many spaces from the front door to the back door and all the rooms in between.
  • Made by machine of synthetic fiber, this area rug is approximately ¼" thick. Easy care and durability are hallmarks of the Aloha ALH-05 area rug.
  • Made in Turkey.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

  • Please Note: The 9'6"x13' rug will be delivered in an economically folded package.
  • Flat woven with a soft cut pile for delightful texture underfoot.
  • Nourison's Aloha collection is at once durable and exceptionally beautiful in color and texture.
  • Perfectly suitable for so many spaces from the front door to the back door and all the rooms in between.
  • Made by machine of synthetic fiber, this area rug is approximately ¼" thick. Easy care and durability are hallmarks of the Aloha ALH-05 area rug.
  • Made in Turkey.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Le Reve - LER01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With a vibrant, realistic look, our Nourison Le Reve LER01 rug is sure to become an instant conversation starter no matter where you feature it. One topic of conversation: how soft it is.

  • Our Le Reve collection is highly resilient in heavy foot traffic areas, making it incredibly practical.
  • Inspired by photorealism, this floor covering boasts a look of billowing cloths in orange, blue, and purple tones, making it a statement piece for any room.
  • This indoor rug features a machine-made, nylon construction and soft, high pile of yarns.
  • Before vacuuming, shake your rug outdoors to eliminate embedded dirt and debris.
  • Made in China.

Title: Prismatic - PRS-36 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The gorgeous Prismatic PRS-36 area rug offers artistic appeal and luxurious comfort sure to transform any space. This exciting design is handcrafted by skilled Nourison artisans for unmatched quality, the pile made from a combination of wool and silky Luxcelle to provide an indulgent tactile experience.

  • Watercolor splashes of gold and sky blue adorn the surface of this enchanting design, bringing a tremendous sense of energy to the composition. The surface is carved with a strong topography that is rich with light and shadow.
  • The exquisite softness of this abstract area rug makes it a fantastic selection for spaces like living rooms, bedrooms, home offices, and more. The borderless layout allows for flexible placement possibilities.
  • Prismatic blended rugs are hand-tufted using a combination of natural New Zealand wool and luminous Luxcelle. The backing is stabilized with sturdy cotton for added strength.
  • Avoid prolonged contact with moisture by blotting spills immediately using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Vacuum in straight lines using a suction-only setting.

Title: Aloha - ALH-18 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Whether calm neutral colors or beautiful deep hues are needed in a lovely all-over leaf pattern, Nourison - Aloha ALH-18 Area Rug is a go-to design for today's interior spaces.

  • Another of the great rugs in Nourison's Aloha Collection, this awesome rug is a perfect botanical look.
  • Flat woven with a soft cut pile for delightful texture underfoot.
  • Front hallway to kitchen or dining room, the Aloha ALH-18 will enliven many spaces in the home. Choose from four beautiful colorways that include a Grey, Blue palette, a Red, Blue, Green mix, a lovely Navy and a low-key Natural.
  • Created of synthetic fibers, this power loomed and hand-carved leaf patterned rug is at once beautiful and durable.
  • Vacuum regularly, but never use a beater bar attachment on synthetic area rugs.
  • Made in Turkey.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Whether calm neutral colors or beautiful deep hues are needed in a lovely all-over leaf pattern, Nourison - Aloha ALH-18 Area Rug is a go-to design for today's interior spaces.

  • Another of the great rugs in Nourison's Aloha Collection, this awesome rug is a perfect botanical look.
  • Flat woven with a soft cut pile for delightful texture underfoot.
  • Front hallway to kitchen or dining room, the Aloha ALH-18 will enliven many spaces in the home. Choose from four beautiful colorways that include a Grey, Blue palette, a Red, Blue, Green mix, a lovely Navy and a low-key Natural.
  • Created of synthetic fibers, this power loomed and hand-carved leaf patterned rug is at once beautiful and durable.
  • Vacuum regularly, but never use a beater bar attachment on synthetic area rugs.
  • Made in Turkey.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Prismatic - PRS-28 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Embrace the dimension and drama that only the Prismatic PRS-28 Area Rug by Nourison can deliver.

  • This eye-catching area rug is beautifully hand-tufted by skilled artisans in China.
  • Blending soft shades of gray with bold pops of gold, this modern area rug promises depth and artistic flair. The swirling, painterly pattern makes this abstract rug a captivating addition to your carefully-curated space.
  • For impressive durability, this medium pile area rug has a cotton backing. The rayon and wool rug also offers a hint of sheen for a stand-out look.
  • To extend the life of your rug and keep it looking as pristine as new, we recommend regularly-scheduled professional cleaning.

Title: Prismatic - PRS-27 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Even your floor will showcase your love of abstract art when you choose the Prismatic PRS-27 Area Rug by Nourison.

  • This gorgeous, hand-tufted area rug is carefully crafted in India.
  • Offering shades of gray and seafoam with golden accents and a captivating, swirling pattern, this modern area rug makes a painterly and unexpected addition to your well-appointed home.
  • This rayon and wool area rug offers a subtle shimmer for an ultra-luxe look. The medium pile rug also features a cotton backing, making it durable and well-made.
  • Between professional cleanings, we recommend spot cleaning and vacuuming on low to keep your rug looking fresh and beautiful.

Title: Glam - GLM-07 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Embrace chic simplicity with the understated, yet beautifully refined Glam GLM-07 Area Rug by Nourison.

  • Boasting a multi-border design in neutral shades of ivory, silver, and gold, this gorgeously textured, incredibly modern area rug is sure to give any contemporary space a fresh and updated new look.
  • This low pile area rug is a fine choice for any room in your carefully-curated home. The cozy, 100% polyester area rug is soft and inviting, yet incredibly sophisticated.
  • This high-quality area rug is machine-made in Turkey.
  • Between professional cleanings, we recommend spot cleaning and vacuuming on low to keep your rug looking fresh and beautiful.

Title: Aloha - ALH-35 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Breezy tropical patterns meet chic contemporary palettes with the ALH-35 area rug from the Aloha collection by Nourison. This attractive area rug features a stylized palm leaf pattern that adorns the surface from edge to edge, the details rendered in a variety of tonal colorways to suit any interior decor theme.

  • Use this area rug indoors or outdoors. Aloha rugs are resistant against weather, wear, and staining for true family-friendly appeal wherever you place them.
  • High-low pile construction makes every detail pop. Use this area rug within demanding indoor placements like dining rooms and kitchens or let its resilience shine in an outdoor placement like a patio or sunroom.
  • Each smart synthetic area rug in the Aloha collection is power loomed from 100% polypropylene with a sturdy latex backing for stability. The edges are tightly serged to prevent fraying in high-traffic placements.
  • Vacuum as needed using a suction-only setting. Treat difficult soil by rinsing with a garden hose. Allow to fully dry before turning to use.

Breezy tropical patterns meet chic contemporary palettes with the ALH-35 area rug from the Aloha collection by Nourison. This attractive area rug features a stylized palm leaf pattern that adorns the surface from edge to edge, the details rendered in a variety of tonal colorways to suit any interior decor theme.

  • Use this area rug indoors or outdoors. Aloha rugs are resistant against weather, wear, and staining for true family-friendly appeal wherever you place them.
  • High-low pile construction makes every detail pop. Use this area rug within demanding indoor placements like dining rooms and kitchens or let its resilience shine in an outdoor placement like a patio or sunroom.
  • Each smart synthetic area rug in the Aloha collection is power loomed from 100% polypropylene with a sturdy latex backing for stability. The edges are tightly serged to prevent fraying in high-traffic placements.
  • Vacuum as needed using a suction-only setting. Treat difficult soil by rinsing with a garden hose. Allow to fully dry before turning to use.

Title: Somerset - ST-18 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Add elegant floral designs to your home's interior when you roll out this ST-18 area rug from the Somerset collection by Nourison..

  • The Somerset collection features quality Nourison rugs made from a blend of acrylic and synthetic yarns for a soft, dense pile.
  • This beautiful rug comes in two distinct color variants so that you can pick the one best suited to your current interior color palette.
  • Add a pad to your purchase to protect the backing and remember to rotate your rug annually to minimize wear patterns.
  • The care tag directions from the manufacturer will tell you everything you need to know to keep this rug in good condition.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Prismatic - PRS-25 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Take inspiration from the nature itself with the colorful and charming Prismatic PRS-25 Area Rug by Nourison.

  • With endless sophistication and attention to detail, this gorgeous area rug is hand-tufted in China.
  • This exciting, abstract area rug boasts a sunset-inspired print in bright, rich hues. Its painterly design lends an artistic element to any space, and the shades of red, orange, pink, purple, blue, and golden yellow ensure that your intriguing design scheme will be effortlessly complemented.
  • This rayon and wool area rug has a delicate shimmer that gives it luxurious appeal. The durable, medium pile rug also features a cotton backing.
  • To keep your rug looking beautiful long-term, we recommend professional cleaning only.

Title: Prismatic - PRS-26 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Paint an artistic picture in your favorite space with the whimsical Prismatic PRS-26 Area Rug by Nourison.

  • This gorgeous area rug is carefully hand-tufted by brilliant artisans in China.
  • This exciting, modern area rug boasts an intriguing, abstract pattern in shades of seafoam blue-green and gold. Whether you view it as a beachy scene or a gemstone-inspired design, this rug is the ideal complement to any contemporary interior design scheme.
  • This medium pile area rug boasts a cotton backing for added durability. The rayon and wool rug also features a hint of shimmer, giving it an eye-catching look.
  • Professional cleaning is recommended, but spot cleaning and vacuuming on low power will also preserve the beauty and life of this beautiful rug.

Body (HTML):
No contemporary design scheme is complete without a statement-making focal point like the Prismatic PRS-24 Area Rug by Nourison.

  • This stunning area rug is hand-tufted by brilliant artisans in India.
  • This bold, abstract area rug offers a captivating gray, golden yellow, and ivory color scheme and a dramatic, painterly pattern. Promising movement and motion, this modern rug is sure to make a statement.

Title: Vail - VAI-02 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Add the softness and durability of wool to your favorite space with this bold Vail VAI-02 area rug from Nourison. The Vail collection features hand-tufted wool area rugs designed with an easy-care, low-shed pile that can stand up to today's busy households.

  • This Vail VAI-02 area rug boasts a bold chevron design with lines that move like arrowheads across its eye-catching textural surface. In addition, this free-spirited rug has a distinct artisanal appeal with its natural ivory and green palette.
  • This handmade area rug has a 0.5" wool pile on a cotton backing. It is designed to minimize shedding and is durable enough for medium-traffic areas. In addition, this rug will last longer on a quality pad.
  • The Vail collection is designed to minimize shedding, which is normal with new wool rugs. The shedding will subside in time, and you can control it by vacuuming as needed.
  • Always vacuum your rug with the beater bar off to prevent unnecessary damage to the pile. Spot clean messes with a damp cloth as quickly as possible and schedule periodic professional cleanings for the best results.

  • This handmade area rug has a 0.5" wool pile on a cotton backing. It is designed to minimize shedding and is durable enough for medium-traffic areas. In addition, this rug will last longer on a quality pad.
  • The Vail collection is designed to minimize shedding, which is normal with new wool rugs. The shedding will subside in time, and you can control it by vacuuming as needed.
  • Always vacuum your rug with the beater bar off to prevent unnecessary damage to the pile. Spot clean messes with a damp cloth as quickly as possible and schedule periodic professional cleanings for the best results.

Title: Nyle - NYE-02 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Take a traditional, timeless approach to interior design with the sophisticated Nyle NYE-02 Area Rug by Nourison.

  • Please Note: runners do not include fringe.
  • Featuring a thin floral border, flourish and medallion designs, fringe trim, and a vintage look, this floral area rug brings a global vibe to your well-edited space.
  • This polypropylene and polyester area rug is soft, supple, and charming. The low pile area rug is easy to clean and easy to style.
  • This stylish area rug promises quality and durability, and it is machine-made in Turkey.
  • Vacuum away dried soiling and staining, and arrange for professional cleanings on a regular basis to keep your rug looking clean and fresh.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Somerset - ST-74 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Soft sprigs of leaves and crisscrossing vines combine in thisNourison - Somerset ST-74 area rug for a naturally fresh, contemporary feel. Give your home a dose of nature by incorporating this rug into your decor.

  • With four color combinations to choose from, this rug truly reflects the infinite variations found in nature and brings those variations into your home.
  • Layer this rug over a larger jute or sisal mat for a warm, modern twist.
  • This rug is machine-made from a combination of 50% acrylic and 50% synthetic fibers.
  • Blot any spills right away to avoid permanent staining of your rug.
  • Made in China.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

  • With four color combinations to choose from, this rug truly reflects the infinite variations found in nature and brings those variations into your home.
  • Layer this rug over a larger jute or sisal mat for a warm, modern twist.
  • This rug is machine-made from a combination of 50% acrylic and 50% synthetic fibers.
  • Blot any spills right away to avoid permanent staining of your rug.
  • Made in China.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

  • Layer this rug over a larger jute or sisal mat for a warm, modern twist.
  • This rug is machine-made from a combination of 50% acrylic and 50% synthetic fibers.
  • Blot any spills right away to avoid permanent staining of your rug.
  • Made in China.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Prismatic - PRS-17 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Beautifully dappled like sunlit clouds hanging in the endless sky, the Prismatic PRS17 area rug is sure provide an uplifting interior aesthetic. Handcrafted by talented Nourison artisans, this piece embodies the best of both durability and opulent comfort.

  • Every detail of this contemporary area rug is underscored by creative variations in pile height, the cleanly carved design lending a powerful three-dimensional effect.
  • Hand tufted from New Zealand wool with luminous Luxcelle accents, this blended area rug delights with its rich textural profile. The cut pile is kept neat and manageable for lasting appeal.
  • Prolong the lifespan of your area rug by disengaging the vacuum brush roll component before vacuuming. Invest in professional cleaning as needed.
  • Made in China.

Title: Prismatic - PRS-14 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Dynamic, energetic, and abstract - the Prismatic PRS14 area rug displays a drama of blues and silvers, dancing against each other like turbulent arctic waves. This spectacular handmade area rug is sumptuously soft, its dependable Nourison quality ensuring lasting appeal.

  • Feel confident using this durable area rug in areas that experience regular foot traffic.
  • While the cool toned coloration proves immediately engaging, the three-dimensional quality of the carved pile invites a lingering gaze. Use this contemporary area rug as a strong statement piece in modern and classic interiors alike.
  • Hand tufted from hardy New Zealand wool and luminous Luxcelle, this cut pile area rug offers a plush tactile experience underfoot.
  • Vacuum regularly. Avoid using any type of vacuum beater brush component.
  • Made in China.

Title: Aloha - ALH-05 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Awesome is the first word that comes to mind to describe the Nourison - Aloha ALH-05 Area Rug. Awash in gorgeous color outlining massive blooms, this area rug will make a big style statement wherever it resides.

  • Please Note: The 9'6"x13' rug will be delivered in an economically folded package.
  • Flat woven with a soft cut pile for delightful texture underfoot.
  • Nourison's Aloha collection is at once durable and exceptionally beautiful in color and texture.
  • Perfectly suitable for so many spaces from the front door to the back door and all the rooms in between.
  • Made by machine of synthetic fiber, this area rug is approximately ¼" thick. Easy care and durability are hallmarks of the Aloha ALH-05 area rug.
  • Made in Turkey.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Awesome is the first word that comes to mind to describe the Nourison - Aloha ALH-05 Area Rug. Awash in gorgeous color outlining massive blooms, this area rug will make a big style statement wherever it resides.

  • Please Note: The 9'6"x13' rug will be delivered in an economically folded package.
  • Flat woven with a soft cut pile for delightful texture underfoot.
  • Nourison's Aloha collection is at once durable and exceptionally beautiful in color and texture.
  • Perfectly suitable for so many spaces from the front door to the back door and all the rooms in between.
  • Made by machine of synthetic fiber, this area rug is approximately ¼" thick. Easy care and durability are hallmarks of the Aloha ALH-05 area rug.
  • Made in Turkey.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Concerto - CNC-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Anchor your favorite space with the warm look of Nourison's Concerto CNC-01 area rug, a sumptuous piece inspired by the textures and tones of natural stone. This durable rug is made from strong yet delightfully soft synthetics sure to withstand the wear of an active home lifestyle.

  • With its cool shades of slate and calming alabaster creams, this abstract rug offers a fantastic way to unify an interior palette of diverse neutrals. This borderless design is equally suited to placement beneath and between furniture arrangements, or even standing alone.
  • Power-loomed from easy-care polypropylene and polyester, this synthetic area rug is sure to maintain its allure even in higher traffic areas.
  • Vacuum regularly with the beater brush component disengaged. Invest in professional cleaning as needed to remove deep-set dirt and debris.
  • Made in Turkey.

Title: Astra Washables - ASW-10 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Complete your one-of-a-kind space with the beautiful blue hues and boho charm of the Astra ASW-10 Area Rug by Nourison.

  • This gorgeous, geometric area rug boasts a bold Moroccan pattern and a stunning sheen that's sure to turn some heads. The global rug is available in a variety of color options, so it's sure to suit your space effortlessly.
  • This 100% polyester area rug is a smart choice for even high-traffic spaces. The low pile area rug is as easy to care for as it is to admire.
  • This machine-washable area rug can be simply laundered as needed, making it a low-maintenance and practical piece.
  • This effortlessly-chic, modern area rug is machine-made in Turkey.

Title: Alanna - ALN-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Embrace the neutral charm and stunning texture of the beautiful Alanna ALN-01 Area Rug by Nourison.

  • Simple, yet lovely, this solid area rug is as well-suited for sophisticated design schemes as it is for casual spaces. Because you can choose between four neutral color options, this contemporary rug will tie in beautifully with your existing boho, modern, coastal, or farmhouse vibe.
  • This handmade, 100% wool area rug is a high-quality and versatile way to anchor your space. With a nubby loop texture, this medium pile area rug is thoughtfully-made and beautifully-detailed.
  • Vacuum away dried soiling and staining, and arrange for professional cleanings on a regular basis to keep your rug looking clean and fresh.
  • Brilliant artisans in India have carefully and meticulously hand-woven this gorgeous area rug.

Title: Prismatic - PRS-18 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Step into a world of imaginative, exciting beauty with this Prismatic PRS-18 area rug design from ­Nourison. With a swirling abstract design and radiant colors, this refined rug is an attention grabber in any space.

  • The Prismatic Collection from ­Nourison is made with daring, 3D-inspired designs brought to life with stunning color palettes. Each rug is hand-tufted from a sumptuous wool blend woven with shimmering, silky fibers.
  • This area rug features a 0.75” pile height. It is handmade on a cotton backing with a blend of New Zealand wool and Luxcelle fibers.
  • The Prismatic PRS-18 area rug can stand up to areas in your home with heavy foot traffic. Vacuum it regularly with the beater bar disengaged and keep it on a pad to extend its life.
  • Spot clean spills immediately by blotting with a damp cloth. Annual professional cleaning is recommended to keep your purchase in good condition.

Title: Prismatic - PRS-10 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Rich shades of blue and gray adorn this Nourison - Prismatic PRS-10 area rug, which uses light and texture in creative new ways for a surprising and elegant finish.

  • The design aficionados at Nourison have teamed up to create this line of contemporary, abstract rugs to give an air of graceful poise to any room.
  • Use this rug to define an intimate sitting area in a larger room or to help disparate furniture pieces feel like part of a unified space.
  • With its optimal fiber blend of 50% wool and 50% synthetic, this rug has a delicate sheen that makes it almost glow in the light.
  • To preserve your rug for years to come, make sure to blot all spills immediately using a white or light-colored cloth, and never scrub at spills to avoid damaging the rug's fibers.
  • Made in China.

Title: Astra Washables - ASW-09 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Incorporate color, contemporary charm, and practicality into your favorite space with the eye-catching Astra Washables ASW-09 Area Rug by Nourison.

  • Featuring a stunning colorblock pattern in muted shades of blue, rust, yellow, silver, and green, this modern area rug takes a bold approach to interior design.
  • This low pile area rug will prove to be a practical, yet breathtaking addition to any space because it is conveniently machine washable. The soft, 100% polyester area rug is as sophisticated as it is cozy.
  • This sophisticated area rug is machine-made in Turkey with quality and durability as top priorities.
  • Spot cleaning and a low-powered vacuum will keep your rug looking beautiful and clean. Professional cleaning is recommended for any tough stains, or for a routine refresh.

Title: Aloha - ALH-26 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Introduce a gorgeous diamond motif to any indoor or outdoor area with this eye-catching ALH-26 rug design from Nourison’s Aloha collection. This area rug will work wonderfully in any contemporary or modern setting with its textured pile and bordered design.

  • The ALH-26 area rug is available in two color options: a black, white, and grey palette and a grey, blue, and ivory palette.
  • This rug has a textured 0.25” high-low pile that is power-loomed using durable polypropylene and finished with serged edges for easy care.
  • This area rug is suitable for indoor and outdoor zones with heavy foot traffic. For outdoor placement, you can extend the life of your area rug by protecting it from the elements during extreme weather conditions.
  • For indoor placement, vacuum your rug with the beater bar switched off and spot clean all spills immediately.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

  • This rug has a textured 0.25” high-low pile that is power-loomed using durable polypropylene and finished with serged edges for easy care.
  • This area rug is suitable for indoor and outdoor zones with heavy foot traffic. For outdoor placement, you can extend the life of your area rug by protecting it from the elements during extreme weather conditions.
  • For indoor placement, vacuum your rug with the beater bar switched off and spot clean all spills immediately.

Title: Astra Washables - ASW-05 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Coordinate an effortless, high-contrast, stylish space with the captivating Astra ASW-05 Area Rug by Nourison.

  • With its circular and linear patterns and its ivory and blue color scheme, this modern area rug promises undeniable charm and a splash of Scandinavian flair.
  • This 100% polyester area rug is a smart choice for even high-traffic spaces. The low pile area rug is as easy to care for as it is to admire.
  • This machine-washable area rug can be simply laundered as needed, making it a low-maintenance and practical piece.
  • The stylish area rug is machine-made in Turkey with durability and quality as top priorities.

  • With its circular and linear patterns and its ivory and blue color scheme, this modern area rug promises undeniable charm and a splash of Scandinavian flair.
  • This 100% polyester area rug is a smart choice for even high-traffic spaces. The low pile area rug is as easy to care for as it is to admire.
  • This machine-washable area rug can be simply laundered as needed, making it a low-maintenance and practical piece.
  • The stylish area rug is machine-made in Turkey with durability and quality as top priorities.

Title: Prismatic - PRS-08 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
A stylized floral bloom bursts across this Nourison - Prismatic PRS-08 area rug, with cheerful colors and bold lines giving it the perfect blend of happiness and strength.

  • The design maestros at Nourison have created the Prismatic line to bring a new spin on abstract and contemporary rug design.
  • This rug is an eye-catcher, so use it as the centerpiece in an otherwise muted room or add it to an already colorful space for a vibrant, tropical feel.
  • For a luxuriously plush sensation underfoot, you'll love this rug's hand-tufted, wool-synthetic fiber blend.
  • Vacuum your rug regularly but, if possible, make sure that the beater bar on the vacuum is turned off to avoid damaging the rug.
  • Made in China.
Option1 Value: Orange, Peach, Violet, Medium Grey, Light Grey
Color (product.metafields.custom.color): Orange, Peach, Violet, Medium Grey, Light Grey

Title: Caribbean - CRB-07 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Rich colors define the incredible floral motif of this tropical-inspired floor covering. The Nourison - Caribbean CRB-07 Area Rug comes in two colorways of navy or red to amp the color quotient in any room.

  • Appealing visual accents and tactile textures lead the Caribbean Collection of coastal style rugs from Nourison.
  • Choose from all shapes to suit your room ideally, this rug also available in various sizes fits spaces from a narrow hallway to an expansive living room.
  • The rug is hand-looped from synthetic fiber making it ideal for indoor/outdoor use and high traffic areas in the busy household.
  • Vacuum your rug weekly to maintain pile and keep clean.
  • Made in Turkey.
  • Please Note: The 9'3"x12'9" rug will be delivered in an economically folded package.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Interlock Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Effortlessly transform your home with the seamlessly stylish Interlock Area Rug by Nourison.

  • Featuring a captivating, contemporary, geometric diamond pattern, abundant texture, and dynamic dimension, this intricate, modern area rug is truly impossible to overlook. Choose between four equally captivating colorway options for a well-rounded look.
  • This 100% wool area rug is effortlessly versatile and impressively durable. Ideal for spaces with heavy foot traffic, pet- and kid-friendly homes, and more, the medium pile area rug delivers both practicality and style.
  • This gorgeous area rug is expertly hand-hooked in India.
  • To extend the life of your rug and keep it looking as pristine as new, we recommend regularly-scheduled professional cleaning.

Title: Aloha - ALH-21 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
By combining a traditional scroll pattern with a modern, synthetic construction, our Nourison Aloha ALH-21 rug balances sophistication with practicality. Basically, it means you can put this floor covering wherever you want.

  • Easy to clean and perfect for high-traffic areas, the Aloha collection lets you stress less about dirty shoes or feet.
  • Flat woven with a soft cut pile for delightful texture underfoot.
  • Sophisticated scroll patterns lend a graceful look to this piece, allowing it to go in casual or formal locations, indoors or out.
  • This medium-pile, indoor/outdoor rug is highlighted by a durable, synthetic construction that's also incredibly soft underfoot.
  • Vacuum regularly on both sides to remove embedded dirt and debris.
  • Made in Turkey.

By combining a traditional scroll pattern with a modern, synthetic construction, our Nourison Aloha ALH-21 rug balances sophistication with practicality. Basically, it means you can put this floor covering wherever you want.

  • Easy to clean and perfect for high-traffic areas, the Aloha collection lets you stress less about dirty shoes or feet.
  • Flat woven with a soft cut pile for delightful texture underfoot.
  • Sophisticated scroll patterns lend a graceful look to this piece, allowing it to go in casual or formal locations, indoors or out.
  • This medium-pile, indoor/outdoor rug is highlighted by a durable, synthetic construction that's also incredibly soft underfoot.
  • Vacuum regularly on both sides to remove embedded dirt and debris.
  • Made in Turkey.

Title: Nourison 2000 - 2206 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The graceful, swirling motifs of this Nourison - Nourison 2000 2206 area rug bring a touch of class and elegance, making any space feel instantly elevated.

  • With its 95% wool and 5% silk fiber content, this rug will instantly catch the eye of visitors and family-members alike.
  • Try using the smaller rectangle sizes of this rug next to your bed or at the foot of your favorite chair to give your feet something special to enjoy at the beginning and end of the day.
  • You'll love the plush, hand-tufted texture of this rug.
  • If a spill happens on your rug, clean it up immediately by blotting with a clean, light-color cloth. Never rub spills, as this can damage your rug.
  • Made in China.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Astra Washables - ASW-12 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Whether you prefer timeless design elements or a more contemporary look, the Astra ASW-12 Area Rug by Nourison is sure to bring a smile to your face.

  • Centered by an ornate medallion design, this traditional area rug is bold and intricate. The heirloom-inspired, old world rug comes in a variety of colorway options, so it's an excellent way to complete your cohesive space.

  • This effortlessly chic area rug is machine-made in Turkey.

Title: Passion - PSN-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Persian-inspired floral motifs enjoy a modern makeover with the PSN01 area rug. This style is part of the Passion collection by Nourison - a diverse series of durable synthetic rugs with something for every interior.

  • Low-pile construction and strong synthetic materials ensure easy care for versatile interior applications in pathways with moderate traffic.
  • Available colorways range from deep and sophisticated to delightfully bright and CLYery. Use any of these traditional rug designs to unify an eclectic palette.
  • This polypropylene area rug gains its crisp visual detail from smart power-loomed manufacturing.
  • Prolong the life of your rug by vacuuming regularly with the beater bar disengaged.
  • Made in Turkey.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Astra Washables - ASW-03 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Create contrast and a cool, contemporary look with the statement-making Astra ASW-03 Area Rug by Nourison.

  • Featuring an ivory and blue color palette and stunning, eye-catching textures, the charm of this modern area rug is impossible to deny. Overlapping semicircles, linear details, and variegated hues give the rug an abundance of style and flair.
  • This 100% polyester area rug is a smart choice for even high-traffic spaces. The low pile area rug is as easy to care for as it is to admire.
  • This practical, versatile, machine-washable area rug is easy to care for. Just toss it into the washer as needed, then line dry.
  • This high-quality, durable area rug is expertly machine-made in Turkey.

  • This high-quality, durable area rug is expertly machine-made in Turkey.

Title: Artworks - ATW01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
By mixing wool and rayon, our Nourison Artworks ATW01 area rug delivers a terrific blend of softness and strength. Plus, it creates an eye-catching statement piece in any room.

  • Thanks to its blend of natural wool and synthetic yarns, this piece is exceptionally comfortable and durable.
  • Somewhere between contemporary and modern, this abstract piece provides an artistic look to any living or dining space with its navy, brick, gray, and cream tones.
  • A thick pile of wool and rayon is machine-made into a soft indoor rug that's incredibly versatile.
  • Vacuuming regularly on both sides will maintain the strength and prolong the life of this piece.
  • Made in China.

Title: Tranquil - TRA03 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Oversized botanical patterns wind their way across the surface of the TRA03 area rug, a playful modern design abound with personality and charm. This style is part of the aptly named Tranquil collection by Nourison.

  • Tranquil collection area rugs are crafted with easy-care fibers for practical placement options within the home.
  • Choose from a variety of color options to best match your interior palette. This floral area rug is well-suited to a variety of decor styles, from clean contemporary themes to specific motifs like nautical or cottage chic.
  • TRA03 is a 100% polypropylene area rug power loomed for exacting detail. The plush pile is cut short at a half-inch height for easier maintenance and upkeep.
  • Vacuum regularly with beater bar disengaged. Periodically invest in professional cleaning to refresh your area rug for lasting appeal.
  • Made in Turkey.

Title: Prismatic - PRS-09 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With two color options to choose from, this Nourison - Prismatic PRS-09 area rug is a highly stylized, abstract masterpiece that draws on natural forms and shapes for inspiration while interpreting them in wholly new ways.

  • For the perfect abstract detail to polish off your room, this rug from Nourison can't be beat.
  • Use the lighter version of this rug to add vivid color to a muted room, or use the darker version to tone down a space that might feel a bit too exuberant.
  • Because of its 50% wool and 50% synthetic fiber blend, along with its hand-tufted construction, we recommend this rug for indoor use only.
  • Spot clean your rug regularly using mild detergent and a white or light-colored cloth, but for all-over deep cleaning, it's best to consult a professional.
  • Made in China.

  • Because of its 50% wool and 50% synthetic fiber blend, along with its hand-tufted construction, we recommend this rug for indoor use only.
  • Spot clean your rug regularly using mild detergent and a white or light-colored cloth, but for all-over deep cleaning, it's best to consult a professional.
  • Made in China.

Title: Jubilant - JUB-06 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Experience subtle flower power as the foundation of any room with our Nourison Jubilant JUB-06 rug. This contemporary charmer boasts a restful palette and comfy feel, so you'll enjoy pure relaxation as soon as you sense it.

  • Our Jubilant collection is not only easy to maintain thanks to its synthetic construction, but it's stain-resistant as well.
  • Peaceful ivory and green hues add even more of a nature-inspired vibe to this contemporary floral piece, allowing it to flourish in your living room, dining room, or entryway.
  • This modern area rug is power-loomed of a low pile of polypropylene yarns for long-lasting resilience.
  • Whether in low or high-traffic areas, rotate your rug to extend its longevity and strength.
  • Made in Turkey.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Aloha - ALH-14 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The Nourison - Aloha ALH-12 Area Rug merges cool and contemporary. At the same time the design shows its classic historic roots.

  • The Nourison Aloha Collection is stunning in a wide range of traditional and contemporary pattern and color, while offering durability and ease of care.
  • For outdoor / Indoor use, the Aloha ALH14 the color and texture is so appealing in two colorways, Navy or Cream. On the patio or in the dining room, bedroom or living room, this is a perfectly executed area rug.
  • Power loomed of synthetic polypropylene fibers, this area rug should be vacuumed regularly and spills cleaned immediately. Outdoors it can be washed with a hose.
  • Made in Turkey.

Title: Vibrant - VIB-08 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Tessellating tile motifs are sprinkled across this Nourison - Vibrant VIB-08 area rug with a hefty dose of vivid color and intricate detail.

  • If you love traditional rug styles but crave more expressive color, this Nourison rug is the perfect combination of old and new.
  • Add this rug to a minimalist space for a jolt of color, detail, and pattern.
  • You'll love the feel of this rug's hand-tufted, loop hooked pile, which is luxuriously soft and plush.
  • To keep this rug's colors looking bright and vibrant, make sure to vacuum regularly and spot clean whenever needed using a color-safe, mild detergent.
  • Made in India.

Tessellating tile motifs are sprinkled across this Nourison - Vibrant VIB-08 area rug with a hefty dose of vivid color and intricate detail.

  • If you love traditional rug styles but crave more expressive color, this Nourison rug is the perfect combination of old and new.
  • Add this rug to a minimalist space for a jolt of color, detail, and pattern.
  • You'll love the feel of this rug's hand-tufted, loop hooked pile, which is luxuriously soft and plush.
  • To keep this rug's colors looking bright and vibrant, make sure to vacuum regularly and spot clean whenever needed using a color-safe, mild detergent.
  • Made in India.

Title: Prismatic - PRS-05 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Whimsically sculpted like a watercolor come to life, the Prismatic PRS05 area rug by Nourison delights with its three-dimensional pile and painterly patterns. This beautiful design is an energetic work of art - a true statement piece for the modern home.

  • Feel confident placing this durable area rug in spaces that experience regular foot traffic.
  • More than capable of capturing immediate attention, use this contemporary area rug to create a dramatic focal point. Place within a social seating arrangement, use as an expressive accent in the bedroom, or let its abstract pattern unify an eclectic decor theme.
  • PRS05 is a hand-tufted area rug made with high quality New Zealand wool and luminous Luxcelle. The pile is cut to an overall medium length, plush and dense underfoot yet simple to maintain.
  • Vacuum regularly with the brush roll component disengaged.
  • Made in China.

Title: Tranquil - TRA08 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Strong floral patterns filter through a faded and nostalgic haze, like a photo print rediscovered between the pages of a long-forgotten journal. The Tranquil TRA08 area rug by Nourison is ready to lend its enchanting ambiance to your favorite space.

  • Easy-care fibers make Tranquil collection area rugs a practical choice for busy home environments.
  • This floral area rug features an oversized pattern that stretches from edge to edge unbound by borders. Use to create a dramatic focal point as a standalone accent, or place as a central anchor within a furniture arrangement.
  • Power-loomed from durable polypropylene, this synthetic area rug keeps things simple with its soft pile cut to a half inch height.
  • Vacuum regularly with beater bar disengaged. Blot spills with a clean white cloth to prevent stains from setting.
  • Made in Turkey.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

  • Easy-care fibers make Tranquil collection area rugs a practical choice for busy home environments.
  • This floral area rug features an oversized pattern that stretches from edge to edge unbound by borders. Use to create a dramatic focal point as a standalone accent, or place as a central anchor within a furniture arrangement.
  • Power-loomed from durable polypropylene, this synthetic area rug keeps things simple with its soft pile cut to a half inch height.
  • Vacuum regularly with beater bar disengaged. Blot spills with a clean white cloth to prevent stains from setting.
  • Made in Turkey.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Tahoe - TA-13 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With its classic patterns an nature derived color palette, the Nourison - Tahoe TA-13 Area Rug brings beauty and softness to hard flooring.

  • The Nourison Tahoe Rug Collection is centered around hand-knotted construction and intense wool colors.
  • This charming rug in gorgeous natural hues of seaglass, green, pink, brown and ivory makes an enchanting centerpiece in the grand foyer or entry.
  • The handcrafted rug is made of plush 100% New Zealand wool with ½ inch thick pile and straight edge with no fringe.
  • Wool rugs should be professionally cleaned annually, and vacuumed with canister vac weekly.
  • Made in India.

Title: Jubilant - JUB-09 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
When you take classic designs and make them contemporary, you get our Nourison Jubilant JUB-09 area rug. With its synthetic construction, this piece is a wonderful mix of comfort and strength.

  • Stain-resistant and strong, this unique collection is perfect for families and those with pets.
  • Traditional damask motifs and contemporary tones blend to create a versatile, transitional piece that makes a beautiful addition to dining rooms, living rooms, and entryways.
  • A low pile of polypropylene is machine-loomed into a gorgeous area rug for precision, comfort, and color.
  • Shake your rug vigorously outdoors to remove excess debris before vacuuming above and below.
  • Made in Turkey.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Vail - VAI-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
If you're a fan of natural materials and handmade craftsmanship, we think you'll fall for this beautiful Vail VAI-01 area rug from Nourison. The Vail collection features hand-tufted wool rugs designed for durability and softness, bringing unique designs to today's homes.

  • This Vail VAI-01 area rug boasts a bold, textural design with graphic lines that create a fresh look reminiscent of tree bark. In addition, it boasts a white-on-blue duotone palette that can fit in with almost any modern space.
  • This handmade area rug features a 0.5" wool pile on a cotton backing. It feels soft underfoot and is durable enough for use in medium-traffic areas. This rug will last longer when kept on a quality rug pad.
  • Please note that new wool rugs produce shedding, but Nourison's Vail collection is designed to minimize this. If you notice shedding, it is normal, and you can control it by vacuuming regularly until it subsides.
  • Vacuum your rug regularly (beater bar off) and spot clean messes immediately using a damp cloth. Periodic professional cleaning is recommended for the best results.

Title: India House - IH-75 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Classic and comfortable, our Nourison India House IH-75 area rug provides the time-honored style of a Persian-inspired beauty as well as the supreme comfort of hand-tufted wool yarns..

  • Premium wool yarns are meticulously hand-tufted by artisans to create the push surface of the India House collection.
  • Persian-inspired florals and a subdued blue tones lend casual elegance to this traditional piece, which is just what your formal dining room, living room, or bedroom need.
  • Dense wool yarns are masterfully hand-tufted into a high pile height by master artisans.
  • To clean light spills or stains on synthetic rugs, simply clean with a sponge, cold water, and mild detergent.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Plateau - PAE-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Soft sweeping striations whisk the eye across the Plateau PAE-01 area rug, a sophisticated Nourison design handcrafted with tactile allure in every detail. This beautiful piece beckons the touch at every turn – its composition is complex, layered, and a treat for all the senses.

  • Choose from four distinct colorways, each one unified by natural easy-to-coordinate undertones.
  • This contemporary area rug offers a warm and freeform take on the striped rug concept. Bands of color stop and start at random, each band emphasized by deep grooves woven into the pile.
  • Plateau is a richly blended area rug made with a combination of wool, rayon, and cotton, irresistibly soft underfoot. Skilled weavers tie every knot by hand for true artisanal appeal.
  • Avoid prolonged contact with moisture by blotting spills with a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Vacuum using a suction-only setting.

Soft sweeping striations whisk the eye across the Plateau PAE-01 area rug, a sophisticated Nourison design handcrafted with tactile allure in every detail. This beautiful piece beckons the touch at every turn – its composition is complex, layered, and a treat for all the senses.

  • Choose from four distinct colorways, each one unified by natural easy-to-coordinate undertones.
  • This contemporary area rug offers a warm and freeform take on the striped rug concept. Bands of color stop and start at random, each band emphasized by deep grooves woven into the pile.
  • Plateau is a richly blended area rug made with a combination of wool, rayon, and cotton, irresistibly soft underfoot. Skilled weavers tie every knot by hand for true artisanal appeal.
  • Avoid prolonged contact with moisture by blotting spills with a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Vacuum using a suction-only setting.

Title: Nourison 2000 - 2204 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The bold, black field of this Nourison - Nourison 2000 2204 area rug is the perfect addition to any home or office space that needs a touch of dramatic glamour.

  • The repeating floral motif in the main part of this rug is a classic hallmark of traditional Persian rugs, but it has been reimagined for the modern consumer.
  • This rug features a black field with tan, burgundy, and cream accents and rich, swirling details.
  • The all-natural fibers of this rug have been hand-tufted for an extra plush feel.
  • Clean your rug regularly but never vacuum with the beater bar turned on. Spot clean as necessary with gentle detergent. Blot all spills immediately.
  • Made in China.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Glam - GLM-08 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Choosing neutral elements like the gorgeous Glam GLM-08 Area Rug by Nourison is the perfect way to anchor any contemporary space in an ultra-chic way.

  • With a lovely ivory, cream, and golden brown color palette and a ribbed border design, this modern area rug takes an understated approach to elevating your interior design scheme.
  • This low pile area rug will prove to be a practical, yet breathtaking addition to any space. The soft, 100% polyester area rug is as sophisticated as it is cozy.
  • The stylish area rug is machine-made in Turkey with durability and quality as top priorities.
  • For product longevity, we recommend avoiding the use of a vacuum beater bar on your rug.

Title: Tahoe - TA-10 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Opulent texture and Oriental pattern give the Nourison - Tahoe TA-10 Area Rug and elegant persona. This luxe floor covering brings expressive aesthetics and intense color to any room.

  • Noursion's Tahoe collection features hand-knotted rugs such as this one with incredible crafted details and soft texture.
  • Place this dynamic rug in the center of the entry or in the middle of the living room seating area for a look and feel you'll love.
  • Handcrafted rug from 100% New Zealand wool with lush ½" thickness with straight woven edge and no fringe.
  • Vacuum with canister vac weekly to preserve pile and avoid direct sunlight.
  • Made in India.

Title: Divine - DIV-12 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The beautiful Divine DIV-12 area rug showcases masterful handcrafted construction, the surface imbued with rich texture sure to turn heads. This impressive Nourison design is a hand-knotted area rug made using a combination of wool and Luxcelle for luxurious comfort underfoot.

  • Layered curves give this contemporary area rug an freeform appearance reminiscent of sand dunes, expressed in soft beiges and tans that are especially simple to coordinate. The decorative possibilities are endless.
  • The dimensional appearance of this rug is emphasized by a high-low pile topography. The base is woven with a braided texture and the raised stripes are made with a soft cut pile. Use this rug in living rooms, home offices, and more.
  • Each rug in the Divine collection is hand-knotted with expertise and experience in every detail. The blended rug composition combines the strength of New Zealand wool with the sumptuously soft hand of Luxcelle.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot spills immediately upon noticing. Avoid prolonged contact with moisture.

Title: Nourison 2000 - 2210 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Add traditional beauty to your floors with this luxurious 2210 area rug design from the Nourison 2000 collection..

  • The Nourison 2000 collection from Nourison features wool and silk area rugs with distinctive patterns and meticulously crafted construction.
  • This rug's pile is 95% wool and 5% silk, so place it in a space that's protected from excess moisture, shoe traffic, and sunlight.
  • Defend your rug's backing and 1/2" wool and silk pile against friction damage by keeping it on a quality rug pad and rotating both every year.
  • Clean your rug per the manufacturer's instructions and schedule an annual professional cleaning for the best results.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Nourison 2000 - 2028 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
If you're looking for a rug so glamorous it could belong to a Venetian palazzo, you will love the Nourison - Nourison 2000 2028 area rug. With its striking contrast and bold yet delicate details, it's sure to delight.

  • With its all-natural blend of silk and wool, this rug will feel especially luxurious underfoot and will have a subtle, silky sheen.
  • This rug comes in a variety of sizes and shapes, so you can find one to fit any space where you might need a rug.
  • A ½" pile and hand-tufted finish make this rug feel polished and crisp.
  • We recommend gentle vacuuming to keep your rug clean, but never with the beater bar turned on.
  • Made in China.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Nourison 2000 - 2028 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
If you're looking for a rug so glamorous it could belong to a Venetian palazzo, you will love the Nourison - Nourison 2000 2028 area rug. With its striking contrast and bold yet delicate details, it's sure to delight.

  • With its all-natural blend of silk and wool, this rug will feel especially luxurious underfoot and will have a subtle, silky sheen.
  • This rug comes in a variety of sizes and shapes, so you can find one to fit any space where you might need a rug.
  • A ½" pile and hand-tufted finish make this rug feel polished and crisp.
  • We recommend gentle vacuuming to keep your rug clean, but never with the beater bar turned on.
  • Made in China.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Jazmine - JAZ01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Inspired by the rich historical traditions of Oushak textile design, the JAZ01 area rug makes handmade artistry accessible for everyday enjoyment. The Jazmine collection by Nourison takes traditional motifs and renders them in 100% wool, lovingly tufted by hand.

  • Hand-tufted construction brings an authentic touch to this irresistibly ornate collection.
  • Classic patterns find gentle expression through a variety of pastel colorways. Use for applications where you desire understated elegance that will complement - but not overshadow - your existing decor.
  • This 100% wool area rug is hand-tufted into a practical 1/2" pile, luxuriously soft but easy to maintain and care for.
  • To prevent staining, immediately blot spills with a dry cloth.
  • Made in India.

Title: Caribbean - CRB-02 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Bring a touch of the tropics to your coastal décor with our Nourison - Caribbean CRB-02 Area Rug. It features a ornate pattern in four vibrant colorways and four rectangular sizes.

  • The Caribbean collection by Nourison offers an exciting variety of foliage and floral-based designs all great for indoor or outdoor use.
  • Ideal for high traffic rooms and busy family households, this indoor/outdoor rug provides softness and durability to your most oft-used spaces.
  • The rug is hand-loomed from synthetic easy-clean fibers for a rug that is durable enough to use outdoors.
  • Rinse your rug with clean water and dry thoroughly to avoid mold and mildew buildup.
  • Made in Turkey.
  • Please Note: The 9'3"x12'9" rug will be delivered in an economically folded package.

Title: Astra Washables - ASW-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make a wild addition to your playful interior design scheme in the form of the Astra ASW-01 Area Rug from the Calvin Klein Collection for Nourison.

  • Ideal for the young and young-at-heart, this children's area rug is bright, fun, and sure to spark a smile. Available in two colorway options, the whimsical design features koalas, big cats, birds, giraffes, and more.
  • This low pile area rug is a smart choice for any kid-friendly space, including play rooms, bedrooms, and nurseries. The 100% polyester area rug is incredibly easy to care for.
  • This machine-washable area rug can be simply laundered as needed, making it a low-maintenance and practical piece.
  • This sophisticated area rug is machine-made in Turkey with quality and durability as top priorities.

Title: Nourison 2000 - 2023 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
If home is a sanctuary, you can count on it being even more peaceful once you add this luxe Nourison - Nourison 2000 2023 area rug to your décor. With its natural fibers and soft color palette, it will soothe even the most troubled visitor.

  • The 100% natural fibers in this rug are environmentally friendly, renewable, and biodegradable.
  • The soft color palette of this rug makes it especially versatile, meaning it will be equally suited to a farmhouse living room, a traditional study, or a modern bedroom.
  • You'll love the hand-tufted luxury of this rug, which is made from 95% wool and 5% silk.
  • If a spill happens on your rug, clean it with a gentle spot cleaner. Don't rub too hard, but blot and dab instead.
  • Made in China.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Divine - DIV-10 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make any room feel richer with a strong textural treatment. The beautiful Divine DIV-10 area rug by Nourison makes a striking impression with an freeform hatched pattern rendered in high-low pile for a sculptural carved effect.

  • Warm cream details pop against a field of lightly striated grey. This contemporary rug color combination is easy to coordinate - simple at first glance but revealing an undercurrent of luxury through its subtle luminosity.
  • DIV-10 is a fully handcrafted area rug made using a combination of supple New Zealand wool and radiant Luxcelle yarns. This rug maintains a low profile for flexible placement potential.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot away spills before they have time to set. Invest in professional cleaning periodically to keep your Divine collection area rug looking and feeling its best.

Title: Aloha - ALH-05 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Awesome is the first word that comes to mind to describe the Nourison - Aloha ALH-05 Area Rug. Awash in gorgeous color outlining massive blooms, this area rug will make a big style statement wherever it resides.

  • Please Note: The 9'6"x13' rug will be delivered in an economically folded package.
  • Flat woven with a soft cut pile for delightful texture underfoot.
  • Nourison's Aloha collection is at once durable and exceptionally beautiful in color and texture.
  • Perfectly suitable for so many spaces from the front door to the back door and all the rooms in between.
  • Made by machine of synthetic fiber, this area rug is approximately ¼" thick. Easy care and durability are hallmarks of the Aloha ALH-05 area rug.
  • Made in Turkey.

Title: Sleek Textures - SLE03 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Dappled ribbons of texture whirl across the surface of the SLE03 area rug like the bold veins of natural marble. This style is part of the Sleek Textures collection by Nourison - a series that embraces textural variation to create a dynamic visual experience from every angle.

  • Dappled ribbons of texture whirl across the surface of the SLE03 area rug like the bold veins of natural marble. This style is part of the Sleek Textures collection by Nourison - a series that embraces textural variation to create a dynamic visual experience from every angle.
  • Choose between warm and cool colorways to find the perfect fit your interior environment.
  • A unique blend of viscose and polyester brings exciting depth to this low pile area rug, peaks and valleys carving a dramatic play of shadows across the surface.
  • Blot spills with a dry white cloth upon immediately upon discovery. Vacuum regularly but avoid using the vacuum beater bar component.
  • Made in Turkey.

Title: Rustic Textures - RUS-10 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Give any space a modern artistic flair with this eye-catching Rustic Textures RUS-10 area rug design by Nourison. This area rug features distressed painterly designs and a subtly textured pile, making it a perfect contemporary statement piece to enrich your favorite space.

  • Nourison's Rustic Textures Collection blends earthy tones, abstract patterns, and a textured, easy-care pile, perfect for today's homes.
  • The RUS-10 area rug is available in an ivory and blue color palette that can work well with a range of existing interior themes.
  • This rug features a machine-made 0.50" polypropylene and polyester pile fixed to a sturdy latex backing. It is recommended in areas with moderate foot traffic.
  • To maintain your rug, vacuum regularly with the beater bar turned off and spot clean spills with a damp cloth. Annual professional cleaning and a quality rug pad are recommended for the most extended life of your purchase.

Body (HTML):
Give any space a modern artistic flair with this eye-catching Rustic Textures RUS-10 area rug design by Nourison. This area rug features distressed painterly designs and a subtly textured pile, making it a perfect contemporary statement piece to enrich your favorite space.

  • Nourison's Rustic Textures Collection blends earthy tones, abstract patterns, and a textured, easy-care pile, perfect for today's homes.
  • The RUS-10 area rug is available in an ivory and blue color palette that can work well with a range of existing interior themes.
  • This rug features a machine-made 0.50" polypropylene and polyester pile fixed to a sturdy latex backing. It is recommended in areas with moderate foot traffic.
  • To maintain your rug, vacuum regularly with the beater bar turned off and spot clean spills with a damp cloth. Annual professional cleaning and a quality rug pad are recommended for the most extended life of your purchase.

Title: Desire - DSR-04 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Sophisticated artistry awaits with the beautiful Desire DSR-04 area rug by Nourison. This alluring accent features an abstract design splashed across the surface like paint on canvas, the pattern filled with energy sure to serve as a transformative addition to any of your favorite spaces throughout the home.

  • Desire is a highly practical collection made from synthetic materials that can readily withstand common sources of damage like staining, fading, and wear. Feel confident using these rugs in active family homes.
  • Choose from two adaptable colorways, one cool and one warm. Each one is built around an ivory base that sets a versatile stage for creative coordination possibilities. Use this abstract rug to complement modern, minimalist, and mid-century decor themes.
  • Each rug in the Desire collection is power loomed with a low 100% polyester rug pile. The fibers are imbued with a silky sheen that gleams in the light, transforming the appearance of the colors depending on the angle of the pile. Latex backing bolsters the composition.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot spills before they set. Vacuum using a suction-only setting. Invest in professional cleaning as needed.

Title: Caribbean - CRB-12 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Lush textures realized in beautiful contrasting hues are the hallmark of this intriguing Nourison - Caribbean CRB-12 Area Rug.

  • The Caribbean Collection is filled with tropically inspired rug creations loop-hooked in plush fibers for enchanting tactile textures.
  • Place this high contrast floor covering in the living room as a vibrant focal point with a transitional style.
  • Machine-made from synthetic fibers, this rug is ideal for indoor/outdoor use and high traffic areas.
  • Keep your rug's appearance fresh by vacuuming with a canister vac weekly.
  • Made in Turkey.

Title: Rustic Textures - RUS-07 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Introduce textured elegance into any cabin or urban loft setting with this understated Rustic Textures RUS-07 area rug design from Nourison. With easy-care fibers and carved distressed patterns, this rug can work well in almost any home.

  • Each rug from Nourison's Rustic Textures Collection combines earthy tones with distressed, abstract patterns. The rugs feature a silky soft high-low pile that adds texture and character to your space.
  • The RUS-07 area rug is available in color palettes, including grey/beige and ivory/grey-blue, both of which can work well with a range of existing color palettes.
  • This rug is machine-made with a 0.50" polypropylene and polyester pile and a latex backing. It is suitable for rooms with moderate foot traffic.
  • Vacuum your rug regularly with the beater bar turned off and spot clean all spills with a damp cloth to maintain the pile. Annual professional cleaning is recommended.

Title: Twilight - TWI-28 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
A radiant ribbon of cerulean blue sweeps across a smooth field of ivory, an atmospheric combination that reflects the early-evening inspiration behind the aptly named Twilight collection by Nourison. TWI-28 is a gorgeous style with a delightful sheen and a super-soft touch.

  • Because its pile is so luxuriously rich to the touch, this contemporary area rug would make a transformative addition to a bedroom or other place where cozy comfort takes a high priority.
  • TWI28 is loom woven with a blend of durable wool and lustrous Luxcelle, finished by hand for quality you can see and feel.
  • Vacuum regularly. It is not recommended to use the vacuum beater bar on any area rug.
  • Made in China.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Rustic Textures - RUS-02 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
This Rustic Textures RUS-02 area rug design from Nourison is equally at home in an urban loft or a country cabin. With a blend of earthen tones and abstract designs, this beautifully textured modern rug is sure to bring rustic sensibility to any space.

  • The Rustic Textures Collection from Nourison is designed to bring depth and texture into any space. These rugs are perfect for adding a modern accent to your home with a silky-soft high-low pile and distressed colors.
  • The RUS-02 area rug design is available in color combinations, including blue/ivory and beige/grey, both of which can easily fit in with most color palettes.
  • This area rug features a 0.50" pile made from a blend of polypropylene and polyester. The pile is machine-made with a high-low pile and a latex backing, and it is recommended for areas with moderate foot traffic.
  • We advise you to keep your rug in good condition by vacuuming regularly, spot cleaning with a damp cloth, and scheduling annual professional cleanings.

Title: Rustic Textures - RUS-02 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
This Rustic Textures RUS-02 area rug design from Nourison is equally at home in an urban loft or a country cabin. With a blend of earthen tones and abstract designs, this beautifully textured modern rug is sure to bring rustic sensibility to any space.

  • The Rustic Textures Collection from Nourison is designed to bring depth and texture into any space. These rugs are perfect for adding a modern accent to your home with a silky-soft high-low pile and distressed colors.
  • The RUS-02 area rug design is available in color combinations, including blue/ivory and beige/grey, both of which can easily fit in with most color palettes.
  • This area rug features a 0.50" pile made from a blend of polypropylene and polyester. The pile is machine-made with a high-low pile and a latex backing, and it is recommended for areas with moderate foot traffic.
  • We advise you to keep your rug in good condition by vacuuming regularly, spot cleaning with a damp cloth, and scheduling annual professional cleanings.

Title: Luna - LUN-02 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Strong linear patterns decorate the surface of the LUN-02 area rug, the effect reminiscent of rugged minerals expressed through sumptuously soft yarns. This gorgeous Luna collection design is handcrafted by skilled Nourison artisans for exquisite attention to detail and quality at every turn.

  • LUN-02 is available in a curated selection of diverse colorways, something for every interior style. Each one glimmers with a touch of radiant luminosity.
  • High-low pile construction makes every line pop. This contemporary area rug showcases a drama of light and shadow for an ever-evolving look.
  • Sumptuous wool and silky rayon are hand-knotted to create this beautifully blended rug design. Each edge is tightly serged to prevent fraying.
  • Avoid prolonged contact with moisture by blotting spills immediately using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge.

Title: Divine - DIV-11 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Elevate any of your favorite spaces with the rich and luxurious texture of the Divine DIV-11 area rug, a masterful production handcrafted by the skilled artisans at Nourison. This sophisticated area rug features a high-low pile construction that beckons the touch at every turn.

  • DIV-11 is available in two colorways, both easy to coordinate with a wide variety of interior color palettes. Each one is woven from luminous yarns imbued with a subtle sheen, transforming the surface into a drama of light.
  • This abstract area rug is decorated with an all-over pattern broken into freeform striations that sweep across the surface. Tufts of plush pile stand out against a looped base, carving an attractive topography into the surface.
  • Authentic hand-knotted construction brings an artisanal element to each Divine collection area rug. These rugs are made from New Zealand wool and silky smooth Luxcelle for an especially velvety soft hand.
  • Place in a dry environment. Prevent prolonged contact with moisture. Blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge.

Title: Natural Jute - NJT-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
You can never have too many natural, beautifully-textured elements in any space - and the Natural Jute NJT-01 Area Rug by Nourison is proof.

  • Featuring a subtly variegated, textured design, this natural fiber area rug is versatile, practical, and pretty. Choose between a bleached or natural hue to refresh your interior design scheme in a neutral way.
  • This flatwoven, surprisingly soft, 100% jute area rug allows you to incorporate beautiful, natural fibers into any room. The low pile area rug is a fine choice for high traffic areas, pet-friendly spaces, and kid-friendly homes.
  • This sophisticated area rug is expertly handwoven in India by master artisans.
  • This rug should be spot cleaned and vacuumed on low. Professional cleaning is recommended, and we advise against using a vacuum beater bar on this elegant rug.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Silk Shadows - SHA-17 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Are you looking for a beautiful, soft area rug that'll fit in with almost any space? If so, we think you'll love this hand-carved Silk Shadows SHA-17 area rug from Nourison. Each piece from the Silk Shadows collection is handmade using a blend of New Zealand wool and shimmering viscose, creating depth and dimension in any space.

  • The Silk Shadows SHA-17 area rug features a beige, cream, and grey palette with hand-carved accents to create texture in the abstract design. A neutral colorway like this one can fit in with almost any existing design – try using it in a modern family room or an elegant bedroom.
  • This hand-knotted area rug features a super soft 0.5" pile that's made from a blend of wool and bamboo viscose. It's suitable for use in zones with moderate levels of foot traffic.
  • Note: New wool rugs often produce fiber shedding for a time – if you notice it, you can vacuum as often as needed until it subsides.
  • Keep your rug in good condition by placing it on a high-quality rug pad and vacuuming with the beater bar turned off. Additionally, spot clean using a clean, damp cloth and schedule periodic professional cleanings as needed.

Title: Silk Shadows - SHA-17 Area Rug

Each piece from the Silk Shadows collection is handmade using a blend of New Zealand wool and shimmering viscose, creating depth and dimension in any space.

  • The Silk Shadows SHA-17 area rug features a beige, cream, and grey palette with hand-carved accents to create texture in the abstract design. A neutral colorway like this one can fit in with almost any existing design – try using it in a modern family room or an elegant bedroom.

Title: Ankara Global - ANR-14 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With splashes of color arranged like gemstones on a soft blue field, this Nourison - Ankara Global ANR-14 area rug is sure to both charm and soothe everybody who sees it.

  • Traditional Persian and Turkish rug designs are incorporated into this rug and updated with modern colors and arrangements for a light, fresh vibe.
  • Center your furniture around the swirling central medallion of this rug for an easy, eye-catching focal point.
  • To make this rug an easy-to-care-for addition to your home, it has been machine-made from manmade fibers.
  • Owing to its light color palette, this rug should be gently cleaned with mild detergent and a white or light-colored rag.
  • Made in Turkey.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Juniper - JPR-04 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With the JPR-04 area rug, Nourison draws influence from antique Persian textiles reimagined with artistic whimsy. This expressive interior accent is part of the super-practical Juniper collection, a series made with smart synthetic materials for classic elegance to suit all your most active spaces.

  • Juniper collection rugs are pet-friendly and child-friendly, perfect for placements that see moderate foot traffic.
  • This gorgeous style features traditional rug motifs centered around a large central medallion, with all edges flanked by layer upon layer of intricate borders. Choose from a variety of exquisite colorways, each one showcasing a spectrum of calming pastel tones.
  • Durable 100% polypropylene rug pile wards away common sources of staining while providing easy-care convenience. Each edge is serged tightly to prevent fraying. All Juniper collection rugs are power-loomed for consistency and value.
  • Vacuum using a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment. Rotate annually. Gently spot clean with a damp cloth as needed.

  • Juniper collection rugs are pet-friendly and child-friendly, perfect for placements that see moderate foot traffic.
  • This gorgeous style features traditional rug motifs centered around a large central medallion, with all edges flanked by layer upon layer of intricate borders. Choose from a variety of exquisite colorways, each one showcasing a spectrum of calming pastel tones.
  • Durable 100% polypropylene rug pile wards away common sources of staining while providing easy-care convenience. Each edge is serged tightly to prevent fraying. All Juniper collection rugs are power-loomed for consistency and value.
  • Vacuum using a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment. Rotate annually. Gently spot clean with a damp cloth as needed.

Title: Ellora - ELL-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Alluring with its enchanting ethereal abstract pattern, the Nourison Ellora - ELL-01 Area Rug is utterly captivating. Dream-like visually and luxurious underfoot--what could be better than that?

  • Awesome and abstract, the Nourison Ellora Collection is filled with rug designs that seem to have stepped from a fine painting fully formed. We're in awe of the designs and the workmanship displayed in this collection. Area rug trends should include these beauties.
  • Choose from two lovely colorways, Ivory with Grey or one simply called Blue, to bring an elevated sense of style to any contemporary interior space. Transitional, this beautiful rug will take centerstage wherever it lands.
  • 56% Rayon, 27% Wool, 11% Cotton and 6% Polyester fibers are hand knotted to create this thick rug that's so soft and comfortable.
  • Vacuum routinely with the machine's beater bar.
  • Made in India.

Title: Desert Skies - DSK-03 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Add elegance and durability to any room of your home with this DSK-03 area rug design from Nourison's Desert Skies collection.

  • The Desert Skies collection from Nourison features hand-loomed synthetic rugs made for today's homes with modern colors and timeless designs.
  • Not sure which color to pick? We recommend basing your choice on the colors in the room that you're furnishing.
  • Prevent friction damage to the 1/2" rayon pile and backing with a quality rug pad and rotate both the pad and the rug every year.
  • Turn off the beater bar when vacuuming your rug to keep the pile in good condition.

Title: Ellora - ELL-03 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Soft blurred lines give the Nourison Ellora - ELL-03 Area Rug a high fashion persona. Hand-knotting goes chic and ultra-modern in this elegant neutral rug. Kudos to this beauty.

  • Nourison's Ellora Collection is a quietly artistic offering of area rugs. Each gives its own subtle interpretation of abstract design. Updated neutral color palettes abound in this sophisticated collection.
  • If a neutral is what you crave, this colorway called Slate is a great way to update any contemporary room. It's so fashionable, but texturally warm and welcoming at the same time. Take this rug into an open living space or a modern bedroom to add handsome good looks.It's perfect for a sophisticated gentleman's quarters.
  • A blend of 56% Rayon, 27% Wool, 11% Cotton, 6% Polyester fibers are hand knotted into an area rug that's irresistibly soft and sumptuous underfoot.
  • Clean with care according to the manufacturer's instructions.
  • Made in India.

Title: Vibrant - VIB-09 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Traditional eastern rug design motifs are reimagined with fresh new colors and arranged in new ways in this Nourison - Vibrant VIB-09 area rug.

  • The 100% wool fiber of this rug is eco-friendly, biodegradable, and renewable.
  • Choose from bright and subdued color variants in this rug so that whichever one you pick, it will be just right for you.
  • This rug's ½" pile is thick enough to feel sumptuous underfoot without being difficult to care for.
  • Vacuum your rug often to prevent matting of the fibers, but make sure to turn off the beater bar to avoid causing damage.
  • Made in India.
