Title: Interweave - IWV-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Style a space that speaks to your one-of-a-kind design style, and use the Interweave IWV-01 Area Rug by Nourison as the foundation.

  • This bold, modern area rug offers a heathered ombre look with subtle pops of color for an understated, yet detailed aesthetic. Choose between a variety of colorway options for a fresh and coordinated focal point.
  • For product longevity, we recommend avoiding the use of a vacuum beater bar on your rug.
  • Promising gorgeous, hand-loomed details, this stylish area rug is expertly crafted in India.

Title: Divine - DIV-07 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Reinvigorate your interior with an atmospheric accent from the Divine collection by Nourison. The stunning Divine DIV-07 area rug goes bold with artful strokes of texture and tone, all rendered in a sumptuous wool blend for an incomparable tactile experience.

  • A carved aesthetic brings true dimension to the surface, light and shadow playing across the high-low pile.
  • This contemporary area rug features an expressive greyscale palette perfect for interior themes ranging from modern minimalist to urban industrial. Explore a range of creative placement possibilities - this piece is strong enough for higher traffic spaces and soft enough for casual retreats.
  • Divine DIV-07 is a blended area rug made with the finest New Zealand wool for longevity, accented with hints of radiant Luxcelle for a luminous sheen. Skilled artisans tie each knot by hand.
  • Invest in professional cleaning as needed.

Title: Aloha - ALH-34 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Ultra-bold patterns make the ALH-34 area rug an especially eye-catching addition for your favorite placements. This piece is part of the all-weather Aloha collection by Nourison, a series of area rugs that can be used indoors or outdoors for endless adaptability.

  • Resistance against staining and wear makes Aloha collection area rugs wonderful for homes that are shared with pets, children, and high levels of foot traffic. These pieces are easy to maintain for long-lasting appeal.
  • This contemporary area rug features a checkered geometric pattern inspired by antique tiles. Use to complement classic and modern decor themes alike. Choose from a variety of versatile colorways to best suit your space.
  • Aloha is a polypropylene rug collection that is power loomed to produce a unique high-low pile, making every detail pop. Serged edges prevent fraying and a latex backing lends added stability.
  • Disengage the vacuum beater bar component before vacuuming or use a hard surface tool instead. Rinse away stubborn soil using a garden hose, then allow the rug to fully dry.

Title: Aloha - ALH-34 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Ultra-bold patterns make the ALH-34 area rug an especially eye-catching addition for your favorite placements. This piece is part of the all-weather Aloha collection by Nourison, a series of area rugs that can be used indoors or outdoors for endless adaptability.

  • Resistance against staining and wear makes Aloha collection area rugs wonderful for homes that are shared with pets, children, and high levels of foot traffic. These pieces are easy to maintain for long-lasting appeal.
  • This contemporary area rug features a checkered geometric pattern inspired by antique tiles. Use to complement classic and modern decor themes alike. Choose from a variety of versatile colorways to best suit your space.
  • Aloha is a polypropylene rug collection that is power loomed to produce a unique high-low pile, making every detail pop. Serged edges prevent fraying and a latex backing lends added stability.
  • Disengage the vacuum beater bar component before vacuuming or use a hard surface tool instead. Rinse away stubborn soil using a garden hose, then allow the rug to fully dry.

Title: Concerto - CNC-05 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
A traditional Persian rug design with a textural twist, the Concerto CNC-05 area rug boasts time-honored motifs enhanced by carved high-low pile. This handsome rug is crafted from soft and durable Nourison synthetics - a practical approach to classic style.

  • This traditional area rug captures an antique look in on-trend contemporary neutrals. Use to bring a formal touch to even the most demanding interior placements like social seating arrangements, foyers, dining rooms, and more.
  • Concerto collection synthetic rugs are power loomed from a combination of easy-care polypropylene and polyester. The pile is kept plush yet manageably low for simple upkeep.
  • Vacuum regularly without using the vacuum beater brush component. Invest in professional cleaning as needed.
  • Made in Turkey.

Title: Aloha - ALH-18 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Whether calm neutral colors or beautiful deep hues are needed in a lovely all-over leaf pattern, Nourison - Aloha ALH-18 Area Rug is a go-to design for today's interior spaces.

  • Another of the great rugs in Nourison's Aloha Collection, this awesome rug is a perfect botanical look.
  • Flat woven with a soft cut pile for delightful texture underfoot.
  • Front hallway to kitchen or dining room, the Aloha ALH-18 will enliven many spaces in the home. Choose from four beautiful colorways that include a Grey, Blue palette, a Red, Blue, Green mix, a lovely Navy and a low-key Natural.
  • Created of synthetic fibers, this power loomed and hand-carved leaf patterned rug is at once beautiful and durable.
  • Vacuum regularly, but never use a beater bar attachment on synthetic area rugs.
  • Made in Turkey.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Marana - MNN-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Bring tremendous texture to your favorite interior spaces with the Marana MNN-01 area rug by Nourison. This series combines the versatility of a classic solid area rug with rich high-low pile construction, a geometric pattern impressed into the surface to create a dramatic interplay between light and shadow.

  • Marana collection area rugs are crafted from durable wool in a dense looped pile – made to stand up to the heaviest foot traffic around the home.
  • Select from a wide variety of color options to suit any interior palette. Space-dyed yarns lend exceptional tonal dimension to each one.
  • This 100% wool area rug has been skillfully hand-hooked by highly trained artisans. Thick pile ensures sumptuous comfort underfoot.
  • Carefully blot away spills with a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Mild shedding is to be expected. Vacuum using a suction-only setting.

Bring tremendous texture to your favorite interior spaces with the Marana MNN-01 area rug by Nourison. This series combines the versatility of a classic solid area rug with rich high-low pile construction, a geometric pattern impressed into the surface to create a dramatic interplay between light and shadow.

  • Marana collection area rugs are crafted from durable wool in a dense looped pile – made to stand up to the heaviest foot traffic around the home.
  • Select from a wide variety of color options to suit any interior palette. Space-dyed yarns lend exceptional tonal dimension to each one.
  • This 100% wool area rug has been skillfully hand-hooked by highly trained artisans. Thick pile ensures sumptuous comfort underfoot.
  • Carefully blot away spills with a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Mild shedding is to be expected. Vacuum using a suction-only setting.

Title: Ellora - ELL-02 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With intersecting "hand-etched" the Nourison Ellora - ELL-02 Area Rug makes an intriguing and slightly mysterious statement. Or perhaps it's simply a gorgeous high-fashion statement. Either way, this is a chic and stylish rug. It will attract lots of attention.

  • The Nourison Ellora Collection puts forth a lovely range of rugs in new neutrals and fascinating artistic patterns. Each and every design captivates.
  • This Ellora area rug could take your already beautiful interior space to a new level of sophistication. It's extraordinary transitional style makes it a magical match for many home styles.Choose from three stunningly beautiful colorways, Sand, Sky or Stone.
  • 56% Rayon, 27% Wool, 11% Cotton, 6% Polyester come together when hand knotted to create beautiful area rugs of superior quality and appealing good looks.
  • Professional cleaning is recommended, but spills can be blotted with a clean sponge or cloth.
  • Made in India.

Title: Weston - Handwoven Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Add a touch of luxury to your favorite room with this stunning Handwoven area rug from the Weston Collection by Nourison. Each rug from the Weston collection brings a blend of practicality and irresistible comfort to any modern space.

  • The Handwoven area rug is available in several attractive nature-inspired colors, including citron, aquamarine, silver birch, Aegean blue, seafoam, brick, oatmeal, vapor, and linen.
  • This thick, soft, and luxurious area rug is handwoven using a blend of bamboo silk viscose and jute. It features a 1/2" pile that feels plush underfoot with a cotton and latex backing for lasting durability.
  • This rug would work well in a bathroom, kitchen, hallway, or entryway with medium to heavy foot traffic.
  • We recommend placing this rug on a quality rug pad and vacuuming regularly with the beater bar disengaged to protect the pile from early signs of wear.

  • This thick, soft, and luxurious area rug is handwoven using a blend of bamboo silk viscose and jute. It features a 1/2" pile that feels plush underfoot with a cotton and latex backing for lasting durability.
  • This rug would work well in a bathroom, kitchen, hallway, or entryway with medium to heavy foot traffic.
  • We recommend placing this rug on a quality rug pad and vacuuming regularly with the beater bar disengaged to protect the pile from early signs of wear.
